subject: Add rails/ to package.json files array
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Add `"rails"` to the `files` array in `package.json` so the pack is included in published npm builds. Add after `"cdk"`.

Note: Only update `package.json`. The root `package.lisa.json` does NOT have a `files` field.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] `package.json` `files` array includes `"rails"`
- [ ] `package.lisa.json` is NOT modified

**Verification:**
```json
{"plan":"delightful-napping-lemon","type":"task","skills":[],"verification":{"type":"manual-check","command":"node -e \"const p=require('./package.json'); console.log(p.files.includes('rails'))\"","expected":"true"}}
```
